title: Convert string to pascalcase
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert string to pascalcase

Pascalcase is a style of writing in which the first letter of each word is capitalized.

Input  : "hello world"
Output : "HelloWorld"

markdown:
## Write a program to convert string to pascalcase

Pascalcase is a style of writing in which the first letter of each word is capitalized.

```
Input  : "hello world"
Output : "HelloWorld"
```
